title: Silver 5 LFT
body:
In Game Name: Lexhanatin

Rank: Silver 5

Position: Any

Age: 18

Location: Queensland, Brisbane.

Previous Experience: Call of Duty 4 Promod 2011-2013, Number 1 CGO Ladder.

Aims: To improve at the game and to play with and against like minded people.

Strengths: Dedication, Availability.

Previous Teams: None

What I am Looking for: I'm looking for an already made team who already had their shit sorted. Don't waste my time if you're a new team.

Profile: http://steamcommunity.com/profiles/76561198018033570/

replies.body:
>Previous Experience: Call of Duty 4 Promod 2011-2013.

This holds no relevance to league whatsoever.
Edited it sorry, forgot to add number 1 CGO Ladder. It doesn't relate to LoL directly, it relates to team stuff.
